name: Mohamed Essam
aboutMeHeadline: I'm Mohamed Essam, a Flutter developer, Technical Writer and UI/UX Designer.
aboueMeDetails: Senior mobile application developer with 4 years of experience in flutter, react native and ionic. Excellent reputation for resolving problems and improving customer satisfaction. Well-versed in inspecting finished buildings to maintain alignment with quality standards. Enthusiastic for new  technologies eager to contribute to team success, attention to detail and excellent organizational  skills. Clear understanding of design patterns. Motivated to learn, grow and excel in mobile development.

projects.title: money_converter
projects.description: A very unique dart package to convert the currencies in flutter. Available at pub.dev now!

projects.title: Naqla
projects.description: Naqla is a construction waste container application, where you can choose the container size and rent it for 10 consecutive days

projects.title: Dgtera Flex
projects.description: Dgtera is an easy-to-use, feature-rich, customizable point of sale (POS) system. This quick, intuitive, and secure platform is a solution for small, mid-sized, and multi-location businesses.

projects.title: Bela

projects.title: Aqarmap
projects.description: Aqarmap app allows you to buy & sell your property. You can easily explore many properties with different prices, areas and types in different locations all over Egypt
